title: Classic Caesar Wrap
subtitle: Quick and portable lunch
recipe: Mix chopped romaine lettuce, grilled chicken strips, Caesar dressing.
Place mixture in a tortilla.
Add Parmesan cheese and roll up.
Serve immediately.

title: Thai Red Curry with Chicken
subtitle: Spicy and fragrant
recipe: Sauté red curry paste in oil.
Add coconut milk and bring to simmer.
Add chicken pieces and vegetables, cook through.
Serve with steamed rice.

title: Pesto Pasta with Sun‑Dried Tomatoes
subtitle: Italian flavor in a snap
recipe: Boil pasta until al dente.
Stir in pesto sauce and sun‑dried tomatoes.
Add a splash of pasta water if needed.
Serve with grated parmesan.

title: Classic Beef Burger
subtitle: Juicy and flavorful
recipe: Season beef patties with salt and pepper.
Grill patties to desired doneness.
Toast buns lightly.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with fries or salad.

title: Beef Tacos
subtitle: Family‑friendly Tex‑Mex meal
recipe: Brown ground beef with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells.
Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese.
Top with sour cream and salsa.
Serve.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
subtitle: Weekend morning vibes
recipe: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Whisk in milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Fold in blueberries.
Cook pancakes on a greased skillet until golden.
Serve with maple syrup.

title: Grilled Salmon Bowl
subtitle: Light & protein‑packed meal
recipe: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon.
Grill salmon until cooked through.
Prepare rice or quinoa base.
Top with grilled vegetables and salmon.
Drizzle with teriyaki or soy sauce.

title: Iced Caramel Latte
subtitle: Cool down with a coffee twist
recipe: Brew espresso or strong coffee.
Fill a glass with ice.
Pour coffee over ice.
Add milk and caramel syrup.
Stir and enjoy.
ingredients: 1 shot espresso or 120 ml strong coffee

title: Margherita Pizza
subtitle: Cheesy perfection in every bite
recipe: Preheat oven to 250°C (480°F).
Roll out pizza dough.
Spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with mozzarella and fresh basil.
Bake until crust is golden and cheese melts.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Avocado Toast
subtitle: Healthy breakfast or snack
recipe: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado and spread on toast.
Sprinkle salt, pepper, and chili flakes.
Top with cherry tomatoes or eggs.

title: Chicken Teriyaki Stir Fry
subtitle: Quick weeknight dinner
recipe: Sauté chicken pieces in oil.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Pour teriyaki sauce and stir.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
ingredients: Cooked rice or noodles to serve

title: Strawberry Smoothie
subtitle: Refreshing summer drink
recipe: Blend strawberries, banana, and milk until smooth.
Pour into a glass and enjoy.

title: Veggie Quesadilla
subtitle: Cheesy and satisfying snack
recipe: Place cheese and veggies on a tortilla.
Fold and cook on skillet until golden.
Slice and serve with salsa.

title: Mango Lassi
subtitle: Sweet and creamy Indian drink
recipe: Blend mango pulp, yogurt, sugar, and ice until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

title: Caprese Salad
subtitle: Fresh and simple Italian starter
recipe: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Arrange on a plate with basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
subtitle: Classic sweet treat
recipe: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Add flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking tray and bake 10–12 min.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
subtitle: Healthy breakfast or snack
recipe: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.
Repeat layers and top with honey.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
subtitle: Creamy Italian pasta
recipe: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and Parmesan, combine with pasta and pancetta.
Serve immediately with black pepper.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
subtitle: Quick and healthy dinner
recipe: Heat oil in a wok.
Add assorted vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and garlic, stir well.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Banana Bread
subtitle: Moist and flavorful snack
recipe: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F).
Mash bananas and mix with sugar, eggs, and butter.
Add flour and baking soda.
Pour into loaf pan and bake 50–60 min.
